verses.text: Saviour, keep me pure in heart, By thy grace so free; Help me, that I may impart Light and joy to thee.
Give me love that would not live, But would bear the cross; Give me love that will not grieve, Though it count all loss.
Give me faith that shall not fail, Faith that cannot die; Make me pure, that I may tell Others of thy love.
Seal my life of thine I pray, Here and there forever; Let no earthly love decay God's eternal love.
